catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 179, Hiroshima Prefectural Museum of Art et al. 2005, no. 133.
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: two long boats at center and L with one lone male figure attempting to steer over waves; tall narrow rocks at R covered in moss with a small tree; smaller rocks near center with moss
medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink, color, gold, and silver on paper
provenance: Fukui Collection, Kyoto; Christie's Hollis Sale (8 June 1976)
signed: LRC: Sōtatsu Hokkyō 宗達法橋
title: Boats on the Sea
